name: Runman Construction Set
overview: In this platformer for 1 to 9 friends to play, from Christian Drapatz, you can create and play a fun little platformer and challenge your gang to try their hand at the levels you make yourself! The included editor makes an unlimited amount of levels possible! One-ways, ghosts and flames can be used to raise the difficulty if everyone breezes through a level. Originally published in RUN Sonderheft #3 (1/1987) and later updated and replublished in 2019 by Laxity.
